speech:
Our spa and Ayurveda programs include:

1. International Certificate in Spa Management (ranging from 1-3 months) tailored for future spa managers.
2. Ayurveda Therapies (2 weeks to 1 month) for those looking to specialize in holistic treatments. Interested in exploring one of these courses in detail?

At F Salon Academy, we offer two courses of Spa and Ayurveda therapy, including:

International Certificate in Spa Management (1-3 months) for a comprehensive understanding of spa operations.
Ayurveda Therapies (2 weeks to 1 month) to learn traditional healing techniques. Would you like to know more about a specific course?

We provide a range of Spa and Ayurveda therapy courses at F Salon Academy:

International Certificate in Spa Management (1-3 months) for aspiring spa professionals.
Ayurveda Therapies (2 weeks to 1 month) to learn about traditional therapies and their benefits. Which course are you interested in learning more about?

At F Salon Academy, you can find:

1. International Certificate in Spa Management (1-3 months) to enhance your skills in spa operations.
2. Ayurveda Therapies (2 weeks to 1 month) for those interested in holistic wellness practices. Let me know if you want to dive deeper into a specific program!
